text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1080 in the ASUS G703GI-XS98K 17.3" 144Hz FHD Intel i9-8950HK NVIDIA GTX 1080 32GB DDR4 2666 2x256GB 2TB SSHD Windows 10 Pro ROG AURA RGB is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS G703GI-XS98K 17.3" 144Hz FHD Intel i9-8950HK NVIDIA GTX 1080 32GB DDR4 2666 2x256GB 2TB SSHD Windows 10 Pro ROG AURA RGB!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS G703GI-XS98K 17.3" 144Hz FHD Intel i9-8950HK NVIDIA GTX 1080 32GB DDR4 2666 2x256GB 2TB SSHD Windows 10 Pro ROG AURA RGB is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1080 in the ASUS G703GI-XS98K 17.3" 144Hz FHD Intel i9-8950HK NVIDIA GTX 1080 32GB DDR4 2666 2x256GB 2TB SSHD Windows 10 Pro ROG AURA RGB is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS G703GI-XS98K 17.3" 144Hz FHD Intel i9-8950HK NVIDIA GTX 1080 32GB DDR4 2666 2x256GB 2TB SSHD Windows 10 Pro ROG AURA RGB!
